title: Truffle Suite
description: The Truffle Suite gets developers from idea to dapp as comfortably as possible.

title: Brownie
description: Brownie is a Python-based development and testing framework for smart contracts targeting the Ethereum Virtual Machine.

title: OpenZeppelin
description: OpenZeppelin Contracts helps you minimize risk by using battle-tested libraries of smart contracts for Ethereum and other blockchains. It includes the most used implementations of ERC standards.

title: Web3.js
description: web3.js is a collection of libraries that allow you to interact with a local or remote ethereum node using HTTP, IPC or WebSocket.

title: Web3.py
description: Web3.py is a Python library for interacting with Ethereum.

title: ethers.js
description: The ethers.js library aims to be a complete and compact library for interacting with the Ethereum Blockchain and its ecosystem.
